recipesJson.name: Kiwi Forrest Bears 3-2-1
recipesJson.author: Vishousvapez
recipesJson.description:
FUCK A FLAVOR BAN!!
Simple 3-2-1 kiwi berry gummy bear recipe ... First time really doing a 3-2-1 recipe that I made.
Sweetener & Coolness to liking (Used- 1 drop Cap Super Sweet/15 ml)
This one needs a 3 day steep for everything to come together 

CAP-27 Bears - Used @ borderline primary/accent %  (Pineapple Heavy Gummy Bears)
FA-Kiwi- Used @ Accent % (Slightly Candied Kiwi)
FA-Forrest Fruit- Used @ Accent % (Mixed Berries-this ones is harsh to me that is why I suggest steeping this)

all in all for one of my first attempts to make a coherent 3-2-1 recipe I feel like this one is a keeper for me

Suggestions always welcome =]

reviews.text:
For some reason im not getting a lot of flavor out of this one, even on my tried and true builds. Im realizing i didn't use the same vg ratio, and maybe i didn't do the percentages right. 
Im giving you 5 stars because what i do taste is delicious, gonna try and get it right this time.
Lovely stuff, definitely one of my favorite 123 recipes. Fruity, flavorful, and well balanced, with each ingredient perfectly complimenting the others. Nice one, Vish!
Simple easy and flavorful, not much more i could ask for. Everything tastes balance and this is a great use of the 123 combo great job & thanks for sharing
Very flavorful recipe for a 1-2-3. The kiwi really pops with a good gummy tropical & berry backbone. Solid mix.
